snippet: On the fifth day of Oscar Pistorius’s trial on charges of murdering his girlfriend, a security guard testified that the South African track star told him that “everything is fine.”
abstract: Security guard testifies in widely-publicized murder trial of South African track star Oscar Pistorious that Pistorious assured him that 'everything was fine' only minutes after the shots that killed Reeva Steenkamp on Feb 14, 2013; prosecutors in first week of trial have attempted to portray dark side of Pistorious's personality related to guns.
lead_paragraph: On the fifth day of Oscar Pistorius’s trial on charges of murdering his girlfriend, a security guard testified that the South African track star told him that “everything is fine.”

headline.main: After Shots, Pistorius Kept Quiet, Guard Says
headline.print_headline: After Shots, Pistorius Kept Quiet, Guard Says
